title: Roche 's expenditure on research and development 2007 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Expenditure in million Swiss francs, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Expenditure in million Swiss francs has increased over the Year.

Expenditure in million Swiss francs is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2009, slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2014, and lastly slightly increasing from 2014 to 2019.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Expenditure in million Swiss francs, of value 11696.0 was reached at Year 2019
Minimum Expenditure in million Swiss francs about 8073.0 was reached at Year 2011
